alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:18AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Live Oak and southwestern Bee Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 718 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near George West, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... George West, River Creek Acres, Dinero and Karon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 47 and 64. US Highway 281 between mile markers 628 and 642. US Highway 59 between mile markers 702 and 730. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
